p: Madin-Darby bovine kidney (MDBK) cells (Sigma-Aldrich, UK) were maintained at 37°C−5% CO 2 in Advanced DMEM (Gibco, Leicestershire, UK) supplemented with 2% fetal bovine serum (FBS; Sigma, Suffolk, UK) and 100 U penicillin/streptomycin (Fisher, Leicestershire, UK). Monolayers of MDBK cells were prepared in 24-well plates at 0.3 × 10 6 cells/well and seeded ~3 h before infections.
